import React from 'react'; import { Layout, Menu, Card, Row, Col, Statistic, Table, Progress, Badge, Avatar, List, Typography, Space, Divider } from 'antd'; import { HomeOutlined, UserOutlined, SettingOutlined, BarChartOutlined, PieChartOutlined, LineChartOutlined, FundOutlined, NotificationOutlined, MessageOutlined, SearchOutlined, BellOutlined, CalendarOutlined, CloudOutlined, ShoppingCartOutlined, TeamOutlined, FileTextOutlined, DownloadOutlined, UploadOutlined, SyncOutlined, CheckCircleOutlined, ClockCircleOutlined, ExclamationCircleOutlined, CloseCircleOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, LineChart, Line, AreaChart, Area } from 'recharts'; const { Header, Sider, Content } = Layout; const { Title, Text } = Typography; // Mock data const salesData = [ { name: 'Jan', sales: 4000, revenue: 2400 }, { name: 'Feb', sales: 3000, revenue: 1398 }, { name: 'Mar', sales: 2000, revenue: 9800 }, { name: 'Apr', sales: 2780, revenue: 3908 }, { name: 'May', sales: 1890, revenue: 4800 }, { name: 'Jun', sales: 2390, revenue: 3800 }, ]; const pieData = [ { name: 'Group A', value: 400 }, { name: 'Group B', value: 300 }, { name: 'Group C', value: 300 }, { name: 'Group D', value: 200 }, ]; const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042']; const dataSource = [ { key: '1', name: 'Product A', price: 32, status: 'In Stock' }, { key: '2', name: 'Product B', price: 42, status: 'Out of Stock' }, { key: '3', name: 'Product C', price: 32, status: 'Low Stock' }, ]; const columns = [ { title: 'Product', dataIndex: 'name', key: 'name' }, { title: 'Price', dataIndex: 'price', key: 'price' }, { title: 'Status', dataIndex: 'status', key: 'status' }, ]; const App = () => { return ( {/* Sidebar */}
Dashboard
}>Home }>Analytics }>Reports }>Users }>Orders }>Customers }>Documents }>Settings {/* Main Content */} {/* Header */}
Dashboard Overview
} /> } /> } />
